A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A long\, rambling\, boring mess. Characters are not developed. The plot is all over the map. Deux ex machina moments happen every time there's any hint of real danger. Overall\, it is the most meh or meh movies imaginable. And\, for the record\, I'm not some fanboy that is upset over some supposed deviation from canon. I could not care less about such things. I went hoping to see a fun\, fast paced\, well put together movie. Instead I found myself fidgeting\, yawning and looking at my watch\, hoping this never ending marathon would finally end.
